Docs.summary: Specifies how a form window is displayed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class. It represents the different states of the form. The default state is `Normal`.
## Examples In this example, you change the form's window state to `Maximized` and display the state information using a label. This example assumes that you have already created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> named `Form1`.
